task.title: How to Speed up CSS Development and Debugging

context.p: You can considerably speed up your CSS development by avoiding invoking the entire pipeline of transforming your DITA maps to PDF. Instead, you can use the merged map and transform it directly to PDF.

step.cmd: Transform your DITA Map to PDF using the transformation scenario you are using: DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS or DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS
Open in the editor the merged file (*.merged.html or *.merged.xml) that is located in the output directory.

Configure a XML to PDF transformation with CSS scenario. Do not add set here CSS files since the merged file already contains pointers to the stylesheets. This scenario uses the Chemistry CSS processor.
Optionally, Enable the output of the CSS processor using the editor preferences: Options Preferences XML PDF Processors CSS Processor
